name: Patterns (itch)
description:
Patterns is a simple, puzzle style game made for KenneyJam 2021. The limitation was to only use Kenney's game assets and the theme was 'Rotation'.

Made with Processing.

There are 3 difficulty modes:

  • 1) Easy mode with a 3x3 pattern grid. 9 pieces in total.
  • 2) Normal mode with a 5x5 pattern grid. 25 pieces in total.
  • 3) Hard mode with a 7x7 pattern grid. 49 pieces in total.

Once you choose a difficulty, the game will begin. Now all you need to do is select and rotate pieces until all of them are in the right rotation! (Tip: If there are gray-ish transparent pixels over a pattern, it isn't in it's correct rotation). There is also a timer and a count of pieces that need to be rotated up top to help you keep track of things.
